qas.question: What is the largest mall in the carolinas?
Where is the hanes Mall located?
Where is the Four Seasons Town Center located?

context: North Carolina has a variety of shopping choices. <a1_0>SouthPark Mall<a1_0/> in <a0_0>Charlotte<a0_0/> is currently the largest in the Carolinas, with almost <a2_0>2.0 million square feet<a2_0/>. Other major malls in Charlotte include Northlake Mall and Carolina Place Mall in nearby suburb Pineville. Other major malls throughout the state include Hanes Mall in <a3_0>Winston-Salem<a3_0/>; Crabtree Valley Mall, North Hills Mall, and Triangle Town Center in Raleigh; Friendly Center and Four Seasons Town Centre in <a4_0>Greensboro<a4_0/>; Oak Hollow Mall in High Point; Concord Mills in Concord; Valley Hills Mall in Hickory; and The Streets at Southpoint and Northgate Mall in Durham and Independence Mall in Wilmington, NC, and Tanger Outlets in Charlotte, Nags Head, Blowing Rock, and Mebane, NC.
